node.title: How much Tax you need to pay for Cryptocurrencies in India?
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
There is still a lot of doubt in the minds of Indian cryptocurrencies Investors about how much tax they need to pay for cryptocurrencies earnings. One think to note that even if you hold cryptocurrencies, you are liable to be taxed if you are not trading it. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmTaL9GneuVVChgpxnHjKqZaWFAvUge4gtMJmkx1me2KKC/image.png)
PC : https://pixabay.com/en/taxes-tax-office-tax-return-form-646512/

Till now, our Indian government has not specified any tax bracket for cryptocurrencies, i.e. as of now taxes are still income-based. If your income plus cryptocurrencies earnings falls under tax liability then you have to pay the tax to the government. However, government is planning to bring either of the two tax slabs and that is 12% (items marked as Goods) or 18%(items marked as capital gains).

For example, if you are earning Rs 10000 you have to either pay Rs 1200 or Rs 1800 based on the slabs.

Though there are no way to evade the tax from Indian Government because your bank accounts will have the KYC attached. 

<hr>

भारतीय निवेशकों के दिमाग में अभी भी बहुत संदेह है उनकी कमाई को लेके की उन्हें कितना कर चुकाना होगा। भले  ही आप क्रिप्टोक्रोपॉर्ड्स धारण करते हैं, फिर भी यदि आप इसे व्यापार नहीं कर रहे हैं तो आप कर लगाने के लिए उत्तरदायी हैं।

अब तक, हमारी भारतीय सरकार ने क्रिप्टोक्रुअनियों के लिए कोई टैक्स ब्रैकेट निर्दिष्ट नहीं किया है, यानी अब करों के आय-आधारित हैं। यदि आपकी आमदनी के साथ क्रिप्टोकैरियां कमाई कर देयता के तहत आती है तो आपको सरकार को कर चुकाना होगा। हालांकि, सरकार दो कर स्लैबों में से किसी एक को लाने की योजना बना रही है और यह 12% (वस्तुओं के रूप में चिह्नित वस्तुओं) या 18% (पूंजीगत लाभ के रूप में चिह्नित वस्तुओं) है।

उदाहरण के लिए, यदि आप 10000 रुपये कमा रहे हैं तो आपको स्लैब के आधार पर 1200 रुपये या 1800 रुपये का भुगतान करना होगा।

यद्यपि भारतीय सरकार से कर से बचने का कोई तरीका नहीं है क्योंकि आपके बैंक खातों में केवाईसी संलग्न होगा।

node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
# Accelerated Mobile Pages Building the future web, together --- ## Screenshots
![1.PNG](https://i.imgur.com/gzWcobL.png)
--- ## Hunter's comment As of now we all want a Web Page or application which will be faster, user friendly and responsive. We spend a lot of time coding to make the application like that with bunch of testing and everything. Wouldn't it be great if everything is coded for you and you just have to import that in your application, this is where AMP comes into picture where it is very simple to create smooth and faster web pages which is totally controlled-able and customize-able. According to AMP, >AMP is an open-source library that provides a straightforward way to create web pages that are compelling, smooth, and load near instantaneously for users. AMP pages are just web pages that you can link to and are controlled by you. If we talk about architecture than AMP is mainly build on AMP HTML (It is just a plain HTML with some restrictions for improved performance), AMP JS (It is a library is used for fast rendering of AMP HTML pages) and AMP Cache (it is used to serve cached AMP HTML pages). An Intro Video by https://www.ampproject.org https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WrpkFROqR0Q What I liked most about the project is that it is Open Source and will change the ecosystem of whole internet by serving web pages faster. --- ## Link https://www.ampproject.org/ --- ## Contributors Hunter: @codingdefined ---

node.title: Peer-to-Peer Trading Launched in India
node.author: codingdefined
node.body:
As you might be aware that The Reserve Bank of India had directed all the banks to stop dealing with crypto currencies whose deadline was on 5th of July. Now there had been a lot of panic selling happened over the last one month and people have sold their bitcoins for loses because of the uncertainity. 

![](https://cdn.steemitimages.com/DQmWGEfR9FS7Ridc7Cd6YyRvyWWFJnsVqVihWtSSZGhiu6E/image.png)

Now some of the Indian Exchanges have already have announced that they will be introducing peer-to-peer model to continue the trade. WazirX CEO Nischal Shetty said that 

> In P2P model, the buyer and seller can deal with each other directly while WazirX acts as an escrow account for holding the cryptos during the transaction so that neither party cheats the other,

Now after 6 days of RBI ban WaxirX has started the P2P transfer and it is the first Indian Exchange to do it. The trading pair is USDT/INR where you can cash in 24/7.

An Example how WaxirX P2P works

Lets say you want to sell 1 BTC worth $6000 which is approximately ₹4 Lakhs INR.

1. At first sell your BTC for 6000 USDT.
2. Then put your 6000 USDT for sale on WazirX P2P.
3. Now once WaxirX finds a buyer to buy 6000 USDT on WazirX P2P, they will transfer ₹4 Lakhs to your bank account.

This is as simple and there is no way of cheating because WazirX acts as an escrow account. You can read more at https://medium.com/wazirx/wazirx-p2p-arrives-today-135d928a0d72
